long_description:
Inputs
------
default: DataContainer
    Any DataContainer - likely connected to the output of the OPEN_SERIAL node.
short_description: The SCPI_WRITE node writes a SCPI command to a connected bench-top instrument and returns the result.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The open serial connection with the instrument.

returns.description: The return value from the bench-top instrument as a Scalar or TextBlob.
